short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multi-Language Captions and Transcription for Presentations on Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features

- Allows the audience to view your speech in text format
- Transcribes and provides subtitles via your microphone 
- Supports most major languages
- Supports Google Slides in fullscreen as well as web pages
- Draggable caption box to align with your presentation format
- Adjustable size

Note: Does not work on Chrome Webstore or Chrome homepage, requires internet connection
